title: Crazedlist T-shirts
content: I stumbled on crazedlist.org, and liked the idea. I noticed he's hawking t-shirts [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132939/http:/www.spreadshirt.com/shop.php?article_id=1514555&view_id=352) and then I noticed the font. Ouch!
author: Kristina Drake

comments.content: eeewwww! Now _there_ is a lack of creativity.... ;-)
Not even good letter spacing, so sad
